Hate speech is a type of speech that attacks a person or group on the basis of attributes such as race, religion, sexual orientation, gender, gender identity, caste, or national origin. While "speech" is a broad term that encompasses many forms of expression, hate speech is a specific type of speech that is intended to harm or intimidate others. Therefore, it is not accurate to say that there is no such thing as hate speech.
